conversion_verification.notes: The conversion successfully transforms the 2D architectural drawing into an isometric 3D cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall geometry. The top surfaces of the walls are clearly visible, and the isometric angle is well-implemented.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout geometry is accurate, including the bay window/window seat area. However, some internal partitions near the utility/stair core are simplified or slightly shifted.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and major structural furniture are present and placed correctly. Some minor bathroom fixtures are less distinct.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity with soft, effective lighting. Background is clean and free of UI elements or text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Simplified partition geometry in the central utility/staircase area compared to the complex 2D plan.
Small window openings on the left side of the plan are missing or merged.

summary: A highly successful architectural conversion that faithfully translates complex floor plan details into a clean, geometrically accurate 3D isometric model.
